description: The States approves the vote for June 2021 after initially proposing the ballot for October.
title: Coronavirus forces Guernsey general election postponement
title_page: Coronavirus forces Guernsey general election postponement - BBC News
maintext: Arguing in favour of his amendment, Deputy Le Tocq said it was impractical to organise the first island-wide election by October, because of strains on the civil service over the summer as a result of the crisis and the time required to train volunteers.
